hackathon-description-text: BuildHer offers hackers old and new the chance to attend beginner-friendly workshops, meet companies looking for talented women and non-binary people, and connect with other women and non-binary people looking to mix their pre-existing passions with coding.
hackathon-eligibility: Applications are now closed for BuildHer 2017.
hackathon-requirements: Your submission must be original, and built in groups of no greater than 4 people. Other than that, the sky's the limit!

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: JP Morgan: Best Hack for Social Good (visit the JP Morgan booth to learn more!)
Intel: Best Health & Wellness Hack Using Arduino 101 and/or Intel Edison

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Scholarship to attend Make School's Summer Academy (

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2145 Sheridan Rd, Evanston, IL 60208, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Does your submission address someone's pain point(s)? Could your submission positively impact other people? Human-centered design is incredibly important to BuildHer's cause.
Does your submission bring together the knowledge from coding/computer science and another field in order to make something totally awesome?
